column5: Adventurers and those passing through welcome! My place is relaxed and the atmosphere is easygoing. Only 15-20 minutes from IAH. Happy to work out a pick up/drop off from airport. Dogs (and kids) are welcome to stay as well! They should list coffee under essentials but don't worry I've got you covered.   House includes a backyard and near some trails, a neighborhood Walmart, and Starbucks. Easy access to 59 for exploring other areas of Houston.  *Double listed for different availability
